member.name: ID3D12FunctionParameterReflection.GetDesc
member.summary: Fills the parameter descriptor structure for the function's parameter.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives a description of the function's parameter.
member.returns: Returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

summary.para:
A function-parameter-reflection interface accesses function-parameter info.
Note This interface is part of the HLSL shader linking technology that you can use on all Direct3D 12 platforms to create precompiled HLSL functions, package them into libraries, and link them into full shaders at run time.
